issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Fix sporadic crashes caused by Gandiva's cache policy
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15160](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15160). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The new Gandiva's cache policy is causing sporadic crashes, but for now this is being reverted based on the ticket ARROW-15110 , which is only temporary.
